EmailTemplate.name: ITM.Email 6.Email 6
EmailTemplate.subject: Bridging {{company.Company Name:default=Your FI}}’s Digital/Physical Divide
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Converge the Physical and Digital to Safely Serve your Customers ${CTAText} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]> Interactive Teller Machines have proven their value in preserving the crucial face-to-face connection customers need amid the pandemic.
What’s more, they’re also a physical connection to the digital space.
As the coronavirus continues to accelerate consumers’ shift to digital, the ITM makes it simple to deliver a convenient, personalized and assisted consumer experience—even if your tellers need to work from home.
Learn more in our quick reference guide. ${CTAText2} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]>
